tool_description: Checks availability of multiple attendees across specified time ranges by querying their calendar systems and returns consolidated availability windows.

attendee_emails.description: List of attendee email addresses to check availability for

start_time.description: Start of availability check window in ISO 8601 format

end_time.description: End of availability check window in ISO 8601 format

timezone.description: Timezone for the availability check (e.g., America/New_York)

error_messages: Invalid email format: One or more attendee emails are not in valid email format.
Invalid time range: start_time must be before end_time and both must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
Meeting duration out of range: Duration must be between 15 and 480 minutes.
Too many attendees: Maximum 50 attendees allowed per availability check.
Calendar access denied: Unable to access calendar for one or more attendees.
Invalid timezone: Provided timezone is not recognized.
usage: Provide attendee email addresses, time window, and meeting duration. The tool will return available time slots when all attendees are free.

available_slots.description: List of available time slots in ISO 8601 format

unavailable_attendees.description: List of attendee emails who have conflicts

success.description: Whether the availability check completed successfully
